summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of SOUTH CONCORD STREET from West Marginal Way South to 10th Avenue South; and certain other streets, avenues, an alley and an easement, by constructing sanitary sewers together with the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6664, and appropriating money from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund in aid thereof as a loan.
